cz.cuni.mff.kocur.server

Class Response

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.server.Response

  • public class Response
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a helper class, that helps us to create a response to request. Main goal of this class is to contain message, object and status. Message and object will be serialized to JSON once we will be sending the response.
    Author:
    kocur
